channel.title: Error
channel.description: [code]client.java:11169: cannot find symbol symbol : variable character location: class client appendToIpBanned(character-lastconnection); ^ client.java:11169: cannot find symbol symbol : variable lastconnection location: class client appendToIpBanned(character-lastconnection); ^ client.java:11169: cannot find symbol symbol : method appendToIpBanned(int) location: class client appendToIpBanned(character-lastconnection); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 3 errors Finished![/code]

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @DrPepper DrPepper
item.description:
@DrPepper wrote:

Oh well heres my void if this is what your trying to make.

public void appendToBannedIP (String player) {

  BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/bannedips.txt", true));

bw.write(player);
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“Error banning ip!”);
}
}

}

Read full topic

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

He’s trying to IP ban a player.
Call appendToBannedIP with connectedFrom like this:

appendToBannedIP(connectedFrom);

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

You can’t have variables with ‘-’ in them.
What you’re doing is trying to subtract the variable lastconnection from the variable character, and call the appendToBannedIP method with the result as an argument.

The argument that the appendToBannedIP method should be called with is a String.

Read full topic
